testimonials.quote: Alex created the most incredible Norse mythology sleeve. The attention to detail and cultural authenticity is unmatched. Worth every penny!
testimonials.author: Marcus Thompson

testimonials.quote: The geometric Viking compass Alex designed for me is absolutely perfect. Clean lines, meaningful symbolism, and flawless execution.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

about.sectionTitle: The Artist Behind the Nordic Vision
paragraphs: Alex Nordström brings eight years of tattooing expertise with a deep passion for Scandinavian culture and mythology. Born in Manchester but raised on stories of Viking heritage, Alex combines traditional Nordic symbolism with contemporary tattooing techniques to create truly unique pieces.

Specializing in blackwork, geometric patterns, and runic scripts, every tattoo is researched for cultural accuracy and designed with personal meaning. From Mjölnir hammers to intricate knotwork, each piece connects you to the rich tapestry of northern European heritage.
about.callout: Every design tells a story. Every tattoo carries meaning. Every client becomes part of the Nordic legacy.
about.imageAlt: Alex Nordström, Nordic tattoo artist at North of Winter Tattoo Studio

items.question: Do you only do Nordic-style tattoos?
items.answer: While Nordic and Scandinavian designs are my specialty, I also create geometric, blackwork, and minimalist pieces. I'm happy to discuss how we can incorporate Nordic elements into other styles.

items.question: How do I book a consultation?
items.answer: You can book through our website or Instagram. Consultations are £150 and include custom design creation, which is applied toward your final tattoo cost when you book a full session.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Begin Your Nordic Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something legendary together

booking.modalDescription: Ready to start your Nordic tattoo journey? Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours with availability and next steps.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your booking
